meanings.definition: An assembly or meeting for consultation or discussion.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood council gathered to talk about the upcoming street fair.
meanings.sent2: The city council meets every Monday to discuss important issues.
meanings.sent3: The council meeting turned into a debate about the best pizza toppings.
meanings.sent4: In the council of elders, wisdom is the guiding light.
meanings.sent5: The council room buzzed with ideas and opinions.

meanings.definition: A group of people elected or appointed to make decisions or give advice.
meanings.sent1: The student council decided on the theme for the school dance.
meanings.sent2: The council of ministers advised the king on matters of state.
meanings.sent3: The council members joked about having a pizza party during their serious meeting.
meanings.sent4: The council of experts provided valuable insights into the research project.
meanings.sent5: The council's decision echoed through the halls of the building.
